title: In My Brother's Shadow
description: Grieving the loss of an elder brother, the hero steps into the haunting, decaying world of the former Communist Block to try to make sense of his brother’s violent death. However, following in his brother’s footsteps, he is drawn into the violence endemic in the region and finds himself confronted with a fight for survival while discovering the secrets of his brother’s past. In My Brother’s Shadow is a powerful novel about trauma, loss, love and redemption in the forgotten corners of the world.
author: Peter D. Campbell
